cms.query.QueryText: SELECT (CASE WHEN EXISTS(SELECT TOP 1 ElementID FROM CMS_RoleUIElement WHERE CMS_RoleUIElement.RoleID = @RoleID AND CMS_RoleUIElement.ElementID = CMS_UIElement.ElementID) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS 'ElementSelected', CMS_UIElement.* FROM CMS_UIElement WHERE ##WHERE## ORDER BY ##ORDERBY##
